leaderboard.winnerText:
Congratulations!

You have won the past leaderboard, for which you are entitled to 1 FREE COUPON for a OUR WATCH FACE of your CHOICE!

Contact us on our social media or at

info@cromacompany.com
by writing:

- your username
- the code you see above
- the desired watch face among our (must be distributed by us - Croma Company).

As soon as possible we will forward you the FREE COUPON :)
leaderboard.loserText: Thank you for participating in the past leaderboard. Although you did not win, we appreciate your effort and dedication. Keep practicing and improving, and we hope to see you again in our future leaderboards. Stay tuned for more updates and promotions from Croma Company! When you win, you will find your secret code here to share with us and claim your FREE COUPON. Keep up the good work!
